articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as England play Sri Lanka in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: England face Sri Lanka in crucial World Cup match - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Newcastle and Italy midfielder Sandro Tonali is banned for 10 months by the Italian Football Federation for breaching betting rules.
articles.title: Tonali banned for 10 months for betting rule breaches

articles.description: Reaction as Manchester City extend winning start to their Champions League title defence, while Celtic draw and Newcastle lose.
articles.title: Contrasting fortunes for British sides in Champions League - reaction

articles.description: South Africa hooker Bongi Mbonambi will start against New Zealand in Saturday's Rugby World Cup final after a ruling there was "insufficient evidence" he used a racial slur towards Tom Curry.
articles.title: Mbonambi clear to start World Cup final

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles England and Manchester United goalkeeper Mary Earps, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Earps your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: Ben Stokes falls for 43 as England lose their eighth wicket in a dismal batting display against Sri Lanka in Bangalore at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: 'The death knell for England's World Cup' Stokes out for 43

articles.description: By the end of the weekend, Ardie Savea could break new ground for his celebrated rugby family, but his low-key approach belies his high-quality output.
articles.title: Savea closes in on greatness as final looms

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund have been around the Champions League block many more times than Newcastle - and it showed, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Newcastle dealt Champions League reality check'

articles.description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino says the closure of a criminal case against him is "no surprise" and that the allegations were made to "attack his reputation".
articles.title: 'Clear victory for me' - Infantino case dropped

articles.description: Ruud Gullit might have been one of the best Dutch players in Premier League history, but an incident from 24 years ago leaves him lower down on Alan Shearer's top 10 list.
articles.title: 'I went barging into his office' - Shearer on Gullit
